body.title: Clean Banana for Dirty Santa
body.body: Even though I originally bought this as a dirty santa gift, I wanted it for myself. As a high school teacher you have to get the kids attention somehow. What better way than with a Banana Phone?!

body.title: No One Has This Yet
body.body: My brother needs nothing and has everything... except a banana phone! He's been using it at work and has been asked by multiple coworkers where he got it so they can get one too.

body.title: Smello?
body.body: My husband put the banana phone to use immediately and everyone in our family has used it. It may seem a little pricey but it's just one of those gifts that are fun and always make you smile. That smile is worth the money.

body.title: Happy Heart, Happy Life
body.body: This product was everything that I had wished for! Easy plug and play! So differently adorable! Makes for a happy wife!

body.title: Goodnight My Love
body.body: My daughter has the love box in her room at her fathers house. It's perfect to send little thoughtful messages before bed or before school.

body.title: Love for Distant Relatives
body.body: I gave it to my grandmother so we could send her sweet messages to make her smile even though she isn't tech savvy.

body.title: A Pretty Gourd Deal
body.body: I was given one of these as a gift from a friend. Its a very unique design and I am already finding it quite useful. It sounds pretty good for a gourd!!

body.title: Music Lover's Favorite Gourd
body.body: I ordered this product for my sister as a birthday present. She's a guitarist and a music lover, so I knew it would be fun and useful. I couldn't help but try it out when it arrived! It's so beautiful!

body.title: Functional Conversation
body.body: I love thats it's handmade. It's a great conversation piece! I love that it is so pretty and unique, and serves a functional purpose as well.
